title: Mapping ESPR Impact: How Zuid-Holland Used Data to Prepare Its Businesses for Digital Product Passports
subtitle: A data-driven approach to understanding which businesses in your region will be affected by the ESPR — and how to support them
featuredImageAlt: Economic overview map of the province of Zuid-Holland showing business activity across postal code regions
excerpt: The EU's Ecodesign for Sustainable Products Regulation will require Digital Product Passports for a growing number of product categories. Most regional governments have no idea which businesses in their territory will be affected. Zuid-Holland decided to find out — and turned the insights into a funded support program.
